channel.title: Tech Ethics Coalition
channel.description: Recent content on Tech Ethics Coalition

item.title: Events
item.description: The Tech Ethics Coalition holds two types of events: Public events where the larger NYC technology community can get together virtually (for the time being). Organizational meetings with core TEC members to organize future events, define the group’s future direction, and settle other organizational matters. Our next online organizational meeting will take place in May. Stay tuned for more information.

item.title: About
item.description: The Tech Ethics Coalition (TEC) is a community of individuals who share information, discuss ideas, organize events, and work together to improve the technology industry. We address the social, political, economic, and ethical issues related to data and machine learning technologies. Topics include data collection and privacy, machine learning and bias, emerging regulation and oversight, and more.
